column2: "Wands are the basic weapon of Techers. Choose a wand if you're not sure what to use."
"They're pretty similar to rods. They support techniques output. Plus, they can be used as a melee weapon."
"A wand is light and easy to handle. And its small size makes it even better for close-room combat."
"Are you interested in wands now? If so, I'll give you this one to play with. It's one of my old ones."
"There is plenty written about wands, but the best way to learn is to get your hands on one yourself. Go give it a shot."
"Wands are techniques weapons with high melee power."
"Let's take a look at basic wand attacks and their techniques actions.  Wands can be used for close-room combat and they can invoke techniques faster than other techniques weapons."
